config.label: Configuration
config.description: System(config.xml, local.xml) and modules configuration files(config.xml).

duplicates.label: Find duplicates
duplicates.command_string: cat '%1$s' | cut -c27- | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -n %2$s

website_chnaged_indexers.label: Please refresh "Catalog URL Rewrites" and "Product Attributes" in System -> Index Management
